C

Caesar - Class in <Unnamed>
Extension of #MonoAlphaSubstitution that implements Caesar shift encryption.
Caesar() - Constructor for class Caesar
A constructor to give a zero shift.
Caesar(int) - Constructor for class Caesar
A constructor to initialise the shift based on the input key.
Cipher - Interface in <Unnamed>
An interface that declares methods related to encoding/decoding.

MonoAlphaSubstitution - Class in <Unnamed>
Provides encryption using a lookup table.

Sets up a 1:1 mapping for each letter in the alphabet.

progress - Variable in class Vigenere
 

S

Substitution - Class in <Unnamed>
An abstract class that provides stubs for single character substitution and uses those stubs to provide string encryption.

V

Vigenere - Class in <Unnamed>
Extension of #Substitution that implements Vigenere encryption.
Vigenere() - Constructor for class Vigenere
Sets an encryption key of 'a' which gives no offset.
Vigenere(String) - Constructor for class Vigenere
Converts the encryption key to lowercase and stores it in the ciphers variable.
